meanings.definition: To enroll as a member of a college or university.
meanings.sent1: She matriculates at the university next fall.
meanings.sent2: He matriculates into the college's engineering program.
meanings.sent3: The cat tries to matriculate into the exclusive club for dogs.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to matriculate into the prestigious university knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: Matriculating into the top university was her lifelong dream.

meanings.definition: To admit or be admitted into a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The new employee matriculates into the company with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent2: After passing the test, she matriculates into the secret society.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tries to matriculate into the birdwatching club.
meanings.sent4: His exceptional skills matriculate him into the elite group effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Matriculating into the exclusive club was a moment of pride for him.
